title: My nan's marrow chutney
ingredients: ['1 large marrow or 2 small, peeled, deseeded and finely chopped', '900g (2 lb) onions, finely chopped', 'salt', '2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and finely choppped', '1.2L (2 pt) malt vinegar', '450g (1 lb) sugar, or less to taste', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 dessertspoon mustard powder', '1 dessertspoon turmeric']
